piml.models.GLMClassifier¶

class piml.models.GLMClassifier(*args, **kwargs)¶

Logistic Regression with L1 and L2 regularization.

Parameters
l1_regularzation: float, default=0

The strength of l1 regularzation, l1_regularzation must be non-negative float.

l2_regularzation: float, default=0

The strength of l2 regularzation, l2_regularzation must be non-negative float.
